name: mikroe.click.ipsdisplay2
short_description: IPS Display 2 Click is a compact add-on board that displays high-resolution graphics in embedded applications. This board features the ER-TFT1.54-2, a 1.54inch TFT LCD display from EastRising Technology, and uses the ST7789V2 controller for 262K color output. The display offers a 240x240 pixel resolution, operates through a 3-wire SPI interface, and includes additional control signals for precise display management. Its small form factor and high-resolution output make it suitable for various projects, including handheld devices, smart displays, and panels requiring clear visual output.
